name: UNTITLED SHOOTER - PLAYTEST BUILD
description:
AN IMMERSIVE SIM TACTICAL FPS

-----------------------------------------------------

It's the future. 

The secret to immortality has been found.

Right after,  the world ended.

You wake up deep in the bowels of one of humanities last remaining outposts, to do the dirty work of your higher-ups using a multitude of weapons , upgrades and strategies.

-----------------------------------------------------

PLAN YOUR ROUTE

  • plan your entry, utilising multiple routes and passages.
  • use specialist tools like the platform synthesiser to drop in at new angles, and take out opponents and targets.
  • destroy the system's server room, or turn off their power!

-----------------------------------------------------

GET TACTICAL

  • Kill your opponents, before they kill you!
  • Disable security cameras and prying eyes to make sure you see your enemies before they see you.
  • In a world of constant regeneration and immortality, enemies regenerate health if you don't shoot them. Gib your foes before they wake up and give you a nasty surprise!
  • Use your ammo carefully; ammo for the most powerful weapons are very sparse.

-----------------------------------------------------

BUY & EQUIP UPGRADES


  • Use the money you've earned to buy new upgrades to get the upper hand over enemies.
  • Equip from a selection of 9 upgrades and 4 weapons which can alter gameplay in minor, or completely game-changing ways!
  • move faster,  throw grenades, synthesise platforms, dual wield, you name it, you can do it. Some upgrades even affect the effectiveness of OTHER upgrades!

-----------------------------------------------------

LOOT & CONQUER

  • Any items you find can be picked up and used. Some items can be interacted with to help give you the upper hand in battle!
  • At the end of a mission, any loot remaining in your inventory is automatically sold. sell broken electronics, hidden items and even body parts!

-----------------------------------------------------

THE OUTSIDE WORLD (coming soon)

  • uncover the secrets of the outside world, and find new upgrades and weapons to aid your progress. Be careful however; There is a reason why we never went back to those ruined lands...

-----------------------------------------------------

THIS IS A PLAYTEST

  • Right now, only 2 levels and the tutorial are available to play at the moment. Although I have another level somewhat ready I feel it is more important to get feedback first, so that I can eradicate any major issues you guys have before I release more content.
  • If you have any feedback, please submit them here.
  • If you want to receive updates, chat, or get help from others, you can join the official Discord.
